content.question: The trial excerpted most likely occurred in response to which of the following aspects of life in English North America in the 1600s?

choices.label: The development of closed and homogeneous communities of believers
The relatively strict oversight of the English government
A demographically and religiously diverse colonial structure
An economy that depended on various forms of unfree labor

content.answer: The development of closed and homogeneous communities of believers

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
